title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open StyledText in word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines of text.
3. Observe the inefficient redraw of the entire client area.

Alternatively, add the following line to StyledText's performPaint method to see the redraws occurring:
System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
